SafeVote 0.9
  • Reference

    Test the sensitivity of a ranking to random deletions

    test.deletions.Rd

    Ballots are deleted until the ranking changes, or until a specified number of ballots (`dlimit`) have been deleted.

    test.deletions(
  votes = "food_election",
  countMethod = "condorcet",
  countArgs = NULL,
  dlimit = NULL,
  dinc = NULL,
  rankMethod = "SafeRank"
)

    Arguments

    votes

    A set of ballots

    countMethod

    The name of a function which will count the ballots

    countArgs

    List of args to be passed to countMethod (in addition to votes)

    dlimit

    Maximum number of ballots to delete

    dinc

    Number of ballots to be deleted in each step

    rankMethod

    Name of a ranking attribute in the output of countMethod

    Value

    A vector of the indices of ballots whose deletions affected the ranking. The vector is of zero length if the 'dlimit' termination condition had been reached without affecting the ranking.

    Examples

    {
data(food_election)
test.deletions(food_election, countMethod="condorcet", dlimit=4)
test.deletions(food_election, countMethod="stv", countArgs=list(nseats=10))
}

#>            2            2            1            2            2
